lead_paragraph: Bail was denied Sunday afternoon for two teenagers charged with first-degree murder in the fatal shooting of an Illinois congressman's grandson following an argument over a pair of basketball shoes.

headline.print_headline: Youths Charged in the Killing of Grandson  of Congressman
headline.main: Judge: No Bail for 2 Teens in Congressman's Grandson's Death

snippet: Bail was denied Sunday afternoon for two teenagers charged with first-degree murder in the fatal shooting of an Illinois congressman's grandson following an argument over a pair of basketball shoes....
abstract: Chicago police charge teenage boy and girl with first-degree murder for death of Jovan Wilson, grandson of Rep Danny K Davis of Illinois; allege dispute over basketball shoes led to fatal shooting of 15-year-old victim.
